special_ability_description: Pufflen has an uncanny ability to identify and use various herbs, especially those related to mind-altering substances. He can use these herbs to create potions that have various effects.
action_name_1_description: Pufflen blows a cloud of enchanted smoke at a target within 15 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated for 1 minute.
action_description: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d10) fire damage.
character_description: Pufflen is a middle-aged Asian human wizard with a super long, platted mustache and long hair. He is often seen with a relaxed demeanor, wearing simple robes and carrying a staff adorned with various herbs.
special_skills: Potion Brewing, Herbal Identification, Fire Bolt
unique_behaviors: Frequently takes breaks to smoke his herbs, which he claims enhances his magical abilities.
typical_attitude: Relaxed and easy-going, with a hint of mischief. He loves sharing his herbs with friends and is always eager to help.
useful_knowledge: Knows extensive details about various herbs and their effects, both magical and non-magical. Has contacts among the Woodland Elves who supply him with rare herbs.
bonds: Deeply connected to the Woodland Elves and their way of life.
flaws_or_secrets: Occasionally becomes too reliant on his herbs, leading to moments of distraction or slow reaction times.
backstory: Pufflen grew up in a remote village where he was trained in the magical arts by an old sage. His love for herbs began when he discovered a hidden grove of Woodland Elves who introduced him to their special weed. Since then, Pufflen has become a beloved figure among both his human peers and his elven friends.
additional_notes: Despite his laid-back attitude, Pufflen is a skilled wizard who can be a valuable ally in battle, especially when his potions come into play. He also has a knack for getting out of sticky situations with his quick thinking and magical prowess.
